title: Bug 113047 - No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node listing does not appear.
EB: The children node listing should appear when changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new data set without a SQL statement.
2. Open the data set editor.
3. In the data set editor data source page, change the data source.
4. The new data source should have no database/table/column information.
5. The children node listing should not appear when changing the data source.
6. Close the data set editor.
7. Reopen the data set editor.
